summary: A higher rez texture for Anjinewabe\'s Lightning Blaze Edge (www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4267)
descriptionHtml:
This replaces the texture for Anjinewabe\'s Lightning Blaze Edge (www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4267) and is a higher rez rework of the original texture.  Most of changes are adding a brushed steel look to all the pieces as well as adding several screw heads and removing some elements that were too low rez to be appealing (in my opinon).

I do have plans to keep tinkering and fiddling with it until I\'m satisfied.

Cheers!
author: cptlee
